port.name: GDMA_SOURCE_L
port.comment: Low 16 bits of the linear GDMA source address.

port.name: GDMA_SOURCE_H
port.comment: High 4 bits of the linear GDMA source address.

port.name: GDMA_DEST
port.comment: Linear GDMA destination address in IRAM.

port.name: GDMA_LENGTH
port.comment: GDMA length, in bytes; must be a multiple of two.

bit.name: START
bit.comment: Start GDMA transfer. This blocks the CPU until the transfer is complete.

port.name: SDMA_SOURCE_L
port.comment: Low 16 bits of the linear sound DMA source address.

port.name: SDMA_SOURCE_H
port.comment: High 4 bits of the linear sound DMA source address.

port.name: SDMA_SOURCE_L
port.comment: Low 16 bits of the sound DMA transfer length.

port.name: SDMA_SOURCE_H
port.comment: High 4 bits of the sound DMA transfer length.

bit.name: ENABLE
bit.comment: Enable sound DMA transfers. This blocks the CPU for a few cycles per sample fetched.

value.name: ONESHOT
value.comment: Stop transferring sample data when the transfer is complete.

value.name: REPEAT
value.comment: Restart transferring sample data from the beginning when the transfer is complete.
